Synopsis: Creates a new HTML summary item data with specified text and information.
Description: This function creates a new HTML summary item data with the provided text and information. It formats the output using New-HTMLText cmdlet.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
New-HTMLSummaryItemData -Text "Total Sales" -Information "$1000"
Creates a new HTML summary item with the text "Total Sales" and information "$1000".

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
New-HTMLSummaryItemData -Text "Total Orders" -Information "50" -Icon "order.png"
Creates a new HTML summary item with the text "Total Orders", information "50", and icon "order.png".
